subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Fredrik Andersson Hed of Sweden won the Italian Open in Turin by two shots after shooting a one-over-par 73, his first tournament victory in 245 attempts over 13 years.
snippet: Fredrik Andersson Hed of Sweden won the Italian Open in Turin by two shots after shooting a one-over-par 73, his first tournament victory in 245 attempts over 13 years.
